Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am eager to make it available. I propose a purchase price of $1,200,000, aiming to ensure both a fair exchange and a mutually beneficial transaction. I trust this offer reflects my commitment to valuing your interest while also safeguarding the intrinsic worth of the product. I look forward to your consideration and response. Best regards, Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
